Name: Big Juicy
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Review: Everything about this drink is juicy, even its creator. A tasty way to top up your vitamin C levels.
History: Created in 2006 by Jose 'Juice' Miranda at Wd-50, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Big Juicy contains 111 calories
